original_title: Lost Cities of the Amazon: The Legend Is Real
overview: Stories of ancient, lost civilizations deep in the Amazon have endured for centuries. But what if they were true? In 2008 Nat Geo followed two archeologist who proved such cities were in fact right front of our eyes. Now, in 2018, even more discoveries show how extensive and populous these Amazon civilizations once were.
title: Lost Cities of the Amazon: The Legend Is Real
